name: Exit (itch) (amusingcat)
description:
Exit is a 3D puzzle platformer game. It is designed for split screen cooperative multiplayer which mean it must be played with another player locally. 

The player control twin brother who break out of lab and find a way out. Player need to cooperate with each other in order to pass through all the obstacles. Reach the elevator to go for the next level. Both players must be present, otherwise it won't go up.

This game still under development. There are four levels at the moment. A new level will soon be published. A feedback would be greatly appreciate.

I recommend to play this game with your friend or family instead of alone, it is much more fun.

Controls:

It only works for local keyboard.

Player 1 Control

Move - W, A, S, D

Pick up - Left Ctrl

Player 2 Control

Move - Up, Left, Down, Right

Pick up - Right Ctrl

Install Instructions

Extract zip file and open Exit.exe
